name: The Third Dimension
description:
This game was made in 2 days for the minijam 129 game jam

move with the arrow keys or ad. You can jump with space, w or the up arrow

to switch dimension, press e, q, shift or ctrl

your goal is to kill(push them off the platforms) all the cubes with the same color as yours as fast as possible(there are 16 in total). My totally legit record is 5 seconds, can you beat it?

when i play in the browser, i cant see the particles and some cubes with the same color as yours
